page.title: 08Old Red House Farm
page.content: My name is Toby and I live on a farm near school.We own fifty acres and another fifty acres are rented.It is not far from the{Fosseway}and until 1984 was a typical family dairy.We had about 75 Fresian cows and thirty young stock as replacements for the cows.In 1980 my Dad started growing{potatoes and now ten acres are used for this vegetable, enough to supply four local shops, a grocery van and a milk roundsman.In 1984 after two very dry summers, the dairy cows were sold and now only the fifty home acres are farmed.{Silage}is made from all the land down to grass, and is fed to approximately sixty cows that are kept in yards all the year round.These cows have been sold to us from other farms because they are unsuitable for milk prodution and we fatten them up for meat production.
